name: adult brain stem glioma
definition: A brain stem cancer that is characterized by mass lesion of the brainstem in adulthood, associated cranial nerve nuclei and long tracts, has_material_basis_in abnormally proliferating cells and derives_from glial cells. [url:https\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brainstem_glioma]

clinicalTrials.title: Alisertib and Fractionated Stereotactic Radiosurgery in Treating Patients With Recurrent High Grade Gliomas
